query: WITH entities AS (SELECT status, id FROM core_credit_facilities WHERE ((status = $1) AND (COALESCE(id > $3, true))) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
